name: Food Crush Jam
description:
The most difficult visual skill game comes back improved for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022".

Test yourself by completing the most difficult modes and eliminate all the fruits in the shortest time possible.

A board full of fruits in which only the most visually skilled user will be able to pass the rounds without forgetting any fruit.

New black and white game mode

Is it possible to win without the help of colors ?
